raw_comment:
I noticed that people who have legacy have a higher admission rate than those without legacy. Students who have legacy have a higher rate of income than people without legacy.

I wonder why the lower income students who don’t have legacy still have a high acceptance rate. 

This impacts my community because we are in high school and we are applying to college soon, and legacy could impact our college acceptance rate. 

“Legacy and Acceptance”
ace_sentences: Some people do not have legacy status.
People who have legacy status have a higher admission rate than people who do not have legacy status.
Students who have legacy status have a higher income rate than people who do not have legacy status.
Some students have a lower income.
Some lower-income students do not have legacy status.
I wonder why some lower-income students who do not have legacy status still have a high acceptance rate.
Legacy status could impact our college acceptance rate.
The headline is: Legacy and Acceptance.
